nodes.id: Canada conducts security review of TikTok investment expansion plan
TikTok Stripping Act: A generalized 'threat' can't overshadow US public opinion
Us journalist Carlson: Google and Facebook are spying far more on Americans than TikTok

Unscrupulous attempts to swallow hundreds of billions of dollars of golden eggs,
the United States grabs the truth about TikTok

the U.S. House of Representatives unanimously passed another bill
Us efforts to crack down on TikTok sparks strong backlash against Israel
